Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAI
    This is the interface, shared by all IA, which has only one method to be called to get a decision
    IClient
    The client interface (stub)
    ILobbyManager
    The lobby manager interface
    IServer
    The server interface (stub)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Contains the login and the password of a player Keeps track of whether a player is online or not
    AIPlayer
    A player controlled by an AI
    ClientSession
    Groups the client ID, the account and the stub of a client/player Also keeps track of the gameLobby in which the client plays
    Core
    This is the core class.
    EasyAI
    This is a very simple AI.
    GameLobby
    This class handles the multiplayer games
    GUI
    This is the Graphical User Interface (GUI).
    GuiLogin
    The Login frame
    GuiMultiplayer
    The game lobby frame
    HardAI
    This is the most advanced AI (that I wrote for this problem).
    HumanPlayer
    A player controlled by a person using the arrow keys
    ImagePanel
    This is a personal extension of JPanel.
    MediumAI
    This AI is a bit smarter than just the random one.
    Node
    This class is only used by the HardAI class.
    Player
    Assembles all the attributes of a player in an abstract class
    RmiClient
    This class implements the client interface
    RmiClientMain
    The RMI client main class, launches a client
    RmiServer
    This class implements the remote interface
    RmiServerMain
    The RMI server main class, launches the server
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyLoggedInException
    An exception that should be thrown when a user that is already logged in, tries to log in through another client
